item.bloodharbourripper.bone_skewer_skel: Basic throwable harpoon. Can be recalled.
Enhanced harpoon. Inflicts Slowness II on hit.
item.bloodharbourripper.bone_skewer.desc: Powerful harpoon. Inflicts Slowness II and Wither. Can execute low HP enemies with Shift+C. You can dash and stun enemies with Phantom Undertow (default: Shift+X).
Mysterious vial found in Ancient Cities. Used to craft powerful weapons.
advancement.bloodharbourripper.sink_them: Obtain the ultimate Bone Skewer and become the terror of the seas
